thread.title: PwC Has an Answer for the Blockchain: Audit It

author: Michael Rapoport
title: PwC Has an Answer for the Blockchain: Audit It
text:
If blockchain technology can validate transactions the way an auditor traditionally does, what’s left for an auditor to do?
PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP’s answer: Validate the validators.
The Big Four accounting firm unveiled a new offering Friday that will provide an outside look at clients’ use of the blockchain—making sure companies are implementing... The WSJ's Steven Russolillo travels the world (sort of) to see how regulators are responding to the remarkable rise of cryptocurrencies.
